definition: relatives/members of the same family, clan, tribe etc
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: Reciprocal altruism and kin selection are the two main theories.
sentences.chinese: 互利主义和亲族选择是两个主要理论。

sentences.english: Though exiled from home, yet still may I sing:All glory to God, I'm a child of the King.
sentences.chinese: 虽远离亲族我新仍歌唱，荣耀归于主，因主永远作王。

sentences.english: And at the second time Joseph was made known to his brethren; and Joseph's kindred was made known unto Pharaoh.
sentences.chinese: 第二次约瑟与弟兄相认，他的亲族也被法老知道了。

sentences.english: 13On their second visit, Joseph told his brothers who he was, and Pharaoh learned about Joseph's family.
sentences.chinese: 第二次约瑟与弟兄相认，他的亲族也被法老知道了。

sentences.english: 58Her neighbors and relatives heard that the Lord had shown her great mercy, and they shared her joy.
sentences.chinese: 邻里亲族听见主向她大施怜悯，就和她一同欢乐。

sentences.english: And the second time his brothers had a meeting with Joseph, and Pharaoh had knowledge of Joseph's family.
sentences.chinese: 第二次约瑟与弟兄们相认，他的亲族也被法老知道了。

sentences.english: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her; and they rejoiced with her.
sentences.chinese: 邻里亲族，听见主向他大施怜悯，就和他一同欢乐。

sentences.english: The neighbors usually know the children's backgrounds and extended families.
sentences.chinese: 附近居民大都知道这些孩子背景和亲族。

definition: imperial clan/member of the imperial clan/clansman/ancestral shrine
father and elder brother(s)/head of the family/patriarch
collateral relative (descended from a common ancestor but through different lines)
wives and concubines (of a polygamous man)/harem
to continue/to continue a family line/posterity/heir
(of cousins) descending from the same grandfather or great-grandfather
